<<<<<<< HEAD
The <info>%command.name%</info> command generates a complete registration form, controller & template.

<info>php %command.full_name%</info>

The command will ask for several pieces of information to build your form.
=======
The <info>%command.name%</info> command generates a complete registration form, controller & template.

<info>php %command.full_name%</info>

The command will ask for several pieces of information to build your form.
